messages.message:
Is there a way to encode a NOT operator in the nginx templated config, I only want to include a block if the env var is not True?
e.g. I want to go from `[[ if (or .KeyValueMap.isAIHubDevEnvironment false) ]]` => `[[ if !(or .KeyValueMap.isAIHubDevEnvironment false) ]]`

`[[ if (not (or .KeyValueMap.isSaasEnvironment false)) ]]`

that could be something like above from similar example is used here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/master/deployment-configs/chart/templates/grafana/grafana-cm.yml#L31

also check this for reference: https://pkg.go.dev/text/template
